Game.Name: The Suite Life of Zack and Cody Tipton Caper
Game.Plot: Based on the Disney Channel show, this game takes players on a daring adventure with the 12-year-old twins at the Tipton Hotel. The boys are on a missionâ€¦crawling, climbing, jumping, racing and wearing disguises to conquer enemy forces, when they discover a plot to steal the crown from a Teen Beauty Pageant being held at the hotel. Players control the twins independently or team up in fun-filled missions to ensure the thief is stopped and the night is a success, all while trying not to get caught.
